method.name: ScrmovToTimeInOut
method.jname: 時系列入出庫予定一覧

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)
arg.param: 時系列入出庫予定一覧

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" as \\"PLAN_TYP\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ALC_GRP_CD\\" as \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\",'YYYY/MM/DD') = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = 0 " +"order by " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""

"select " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" as \\"CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" and M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" = '0' " +" and TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd') " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\"), " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT\\" as \\"PKG_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" as \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_JOB_ODR(\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", \\"PLAN_TYP\\", \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\") " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DDHH24MI'), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?)"

"UPDATE " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"SET " +" \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"PLAN_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DDHH24MI'), " +" \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"delete from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" as \\"CAL_DATE\\", " +" M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" as \\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" and TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd') " +" and TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd') " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" M_CAL.CAL_DATE"

"select " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and TO_DATE(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd')"

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"For Update nowait"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = 0 " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = 0 " +"order by " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""

"SELECT " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" AS \\"CAL_DATE\\", " +" M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" AS \\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" AND TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd') " +" AND TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy/mm/dd') " +" AND M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" M_CAL.CAL_DATE"
"SELECT " +" \\"CAL_NO\\" AS \\"CAL_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" \\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" IS NOT NULL"

"SELECT " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" AS \\"CAL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" AND M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND TO_DATE(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") = TO_DATE(?) " +" AND M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" VALUE " +"from " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"where " +" NAME = 'MAX_DISPLAY_MONTH_SERIAL'"
"SELECT " +" SP.VALUE AS JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER SP " +"WHERE " +" SP.NAME = 'JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'TIME_CTRL'"

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLAN_TYP\\" as \\"PLAN_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ALC_GRP_CD\\" as \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = 0 " +"order by " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""
"SELECT " +" VALUE " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.NAME = 'PRD_REQ_JOB_ODR_TYP_2'"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(A.ALCD_QTY), 'TM9') " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A " +"WHERE " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND A.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = 0 " +" AND A.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ( " +" SELECT " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" )"

"SELECT " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC A " +"WHERE " +" A.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND A.COMPANY_CD = ( " +" SELECT " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) " +" AND A.JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO = '0'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" AS \\"OPTION_ID\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'JA*'"
"select " +" OD_CALC_FLG " +"from " +" SYS_OD_CALC_CTRL " +"where " +" OD_CALC_FLG = '1'"
"insert into " +" SYS_JOB_OD_CALC_CTRL(PLANT_CD, JOB_ODR_CD, OD_CALC_FLG, OD_MNT_FLG) " +"values " +" (?, ?, 0, 1)"
"select " +" OD_CALC_FLG " +"from " +" SYS_JOB_OD_CALC_CTRL " +"where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and JOB_ODR_CD = ?"
"delete from " +" SYS_JOB_OD_CALC_CTRL " +"where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and JOB_ODR_CD = ?"
"update " +" SYS_JOB_OD_CALC_CTRL " +"set " +" OD_MNT_FLG = 1 " +"where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and JOB_ODR_CD = ?"
"select " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and JOB_ODR_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" AS \\"OPTION_ID\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'JF*' " +" AND SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" = 1"
"SELECT " +" T_JOB_ODR.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"WHERE " +" T_JOB_ODR.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND T_JOB_ODR.JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO = 0 " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"

cell.name: JobOdrExpect
cell.description: 状態区分/処理区分/削除フラグから判定する 製番の予定

cell.name: d_DATE_TO
cell.description: 生産計画期間（TO） DATE型で保持

cell.name: d_DATE_FROM
cell.description: 生産計画期間（FROM） DATE型で保持
